alert.note: Alert for Bucks; Delaware; Montgomery; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 09 at 5:42PM EDT until July 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 465, PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING, IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN DELAWARE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHERN DELAWARE NEW CASTLE IN NEW JERSEY THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL NEW JERSEY MERCER IN NORTHERN NEW JERSEY HUNTERDON MIDDLESEX SOMERSET IN SOUTHERN NEW JERSEY ATLANTIC BURLINGTON CAMDEN CUMBERLAND GLOUCESTER SALEM IN PENNSYLVANIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST PENNSYLVANIA BUCKS DELAWARE MONTGOMERY PHILADELPHIA THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ATLANTIC CITY, CAMDEN, CHERRY HILL, DEPTFORD, DOYLESTOWN, EAST BRUNSWICK, EDISON, FLEMINGTON, GLASSBORO, HAMMONTON, MEDIA, MILLVILLE, MOORESTOWN, MOUNT HOLLY, NEW BRUNSWICK, NORRISTOWN, NORTH BRUNSWICK TOWNSHIP, PENNSVILLE, PERTH AMBOY, PHILADELPHIA, SAYREVILLE, SOMERSET, TRENTON, AND WILMINGTON.
